sections.heading: Introduction
content: Welcome to EasyImage ('we', 'our', 'us', or 'the Website'). This User Agreement ('Agreement') governs your use of the EasyImage website, accessible at easyimage.work, and all associated services.
By accessing or using EasyImage, you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this Agreement, you must not access or use the Website.

sections.heading: Service Description
content: EasyImage provides free browser-based tools for online image processing. All services are provided at no cost to the user.
All image processing functions are executed entirely within your browser. No user files are uploaded to our servers.
The performance and effectiveness of our tools are dependent on your device's capabilities, including hardware specifications, browser version, and available system resources.

Your images are processed entirely within your browser and are not uploaded to our servers.
